text:
Program Proposals for Educational Radio Stations
September 17, 1968
Grants to individual educational radio stations
(minimum of 20 and maximum of 40 grants) in amounts
ranging from $3,000 to $10,000*
Grants to be made on the basis of applications for
funding for experimental programming. Funding used
primarily for production purposes with permission
approvedfor equipment purchases relating directly
to the experimental project. Series produced or
reports submitted serve as a base for possible future
grants for programs or series.
Total Budgets $132,000
